I am implementing a bot (AI for a video game). I am trying to evolve a beha=
viour with NEAT for choosing a point on a map to navigate too.

I am using =
the routing algorithm A* to create the path between points.

The algorithm =
will have to (ideally) choose the best point to run too and hide at from a =
set of points it has encountered before.

The set of possible navigable poi=
nts should grow as the AI bot encounters them.

The bot will navigate for d=
ifferent reasons. But right now the reason will be to avoid enemy players.
=

Any suggestions on how to structure the inputs and fitness function?

To s=
ummarize I want the neural net to choose the best place to hide in a map. T=
he A* algorithm will then create the path between this point and the bots c=
urrent position.

Thanks for any suggestions,

Shane
